xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 26 July 2013
xwikidoc.content: <misko_> has quit 03:22 <misko_> has quit 06:20 <bvancea> has quit 11:01 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 11:48 <ravigarg27> has joined #phenotips 11:50 <ravigarg27> Hi sdumitriu1 11:51 <sdumitriu1> Hi ravigarg27 11:53 <ravigarg27> I mailed them today and got an early reply They have updated code in their svn trunk and are also planning to release 3.1 version of cTAKES soon 11:53 <ravigarg27> http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/ctakes-user/201307.mbox/browser 11:55 <sdumitriu1> Great 11:56 <sdumitriu1> So they have other improvements coming 11:56 <ravigarg27> yeah, so what should I do now to integrate the library from trunk 11:57 <ravigarg27> I have actually never worked with svn 11:57 <ravigarg27> I have installed the subversion plugin though for eclipse 11:58 <ravigarg27> and understood I have to checkout the project, but I am not getting how to integrate that with phenotips 11:59 <sdumitriu1> I'd suggest using the 3.1 branch instead of trunk 11:59 <sdumitriu1> https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/ctakes/branches/ctakes-3.1.0/ 11:59 <sdumitriu1> svn checout https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/ctakes/branches/ctakes-3.1.0/ 11:59 <sdumitriu1> Then run 11:59 <sdumitriu1> mvn install 12:00 <sdumitriu1> And in the ctakes module in phenotips sources update the version to 3.1.0-SNAPSHOT 12:03 <ravigarg27> but wont it give an error since it is not on maven central 12:03 <sdumitriu1> No 12:03 <sdumitriu1> It's going to find it in the local repository 12:03 <sdumitriu1> That's where maven looks first, always 12:04 <ravigarg27> ohh okay 12:04 <ravigarg27> great 12:04 <sdumitriu1> But it will fail if somebody else wants to build without building ctakes first 12:04 <sdumitriu1> So the code can't be integrated until 3.1.0 is released 12:05 <ravigarg27> yeah hoping they release it soon 12:31 <ravigarg27> has quit 12:45 <bvancea> has quit 12:46 <bvancea_> is now known as <bvancea> 13:07 <sdumitriu1> has quit 13:29 <bvancea> has quit 13:41 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 13:49 <sdumitriu1> has quit 14:14 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 14:21 <sdumitriu1> has quit 14:26 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 14:37 <sdumitriu1> has quit 14:52 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 14:57 <sdumitriu1> has quit 15:01 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 17:34 <bvancea> has quit 18:02 <marta> has quit 18:02 <marta> has joined #phenotips 19:07 <phenotips_org> has joined #phenotips 19:10 <sdumitriu1> has quit 20:09 <sdumitriu> has quit 20:11 <sdumitriu> has joined #phenotips
